Class ShapeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeHelper

  • public class ShapeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    ShapeHelper is a class that compares/draws/sorts/converts to polygon given Shape objects

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double PI 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Polygon[] convertAll(Shape[] s)
      printAll converts all Shape objects to Polygon objects
      static void drawAll(Shape[] s)
      drawAll draws all the shapes except any ComposedShape object on the screen any ComposedShape object is drawn on another screen
      static void drawPoly(Shape[] s)
      drawPoly draws only any Polygon object on the screen
      static double hypotenus(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2) 
      static void printAll(Shape[] s)
      printAll prints any Shape object's info on the screen
      static void sortShapes(Shape[] s)
      sortShapes sorts all Shape objects according to their areas

                            throws MyErrors
